inclusion.criterion: Obstetrical and gynecological patients undergoing abdominal surgery.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who have a nasogastric tube for bowel decompression.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects with mechanical bowel obstruction undergoing bowel resection.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has watery diarrhea without odor, reduced skin turgor and dry mucosa. V. cholerae seen in stool specimen.
